comments.body: What if someone changes java source? Don't you still need to rebuild?
Java sources are handled differently by sbt, I don't actually know the details.

diffHunk:

    val forceRun = dumpInc || ctx.settings.YforceSbtPhases.value
    if ((ctx.sbtCallback != null || forceRun) && !unit.isJava) {
      val sourceFile = unit.source.file.file
      val apiTraverser = new ExtractAPICollector
